name: Party Wizard
description:
The crown has been a bummer for months. 

You are the Party Wizard. It is your job to cheer the people up by throwing awesome parties.

Conjure balloons to generate Party Power to fuel spells. 

While you keep the party alive your guests will generate happiness.

The more happiness you get, the better your rating at the end of the party.

Good luck, Party Wizard!

I created all the game assets by myself except for the music which has been generously provided.

RPG Ambient 4 (The Dark Wood) by Kenney

Toy Sounds Vol. 1 by Captive Portal
